content: -materials cotton yarn i used lily sugar and cream cotton in yellow and white g hook 4mm needle for weaving in ends scissors -gauge my hook size and gauge make the bib about 6 inches wide and 5 inches tall not including the ties i do have a tight gauge so you may want to adjust your hook size -abbreviations chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet single_crochet decrease - single_crochet decrease slip_stitch - slip_stitch rs - right side ws - wrong side st s - stitch es *permissions* - you are free sell what you make from this pattern i would appreciate links back to my blog to credit me as the designer - you may not use my photos - you may not sell this pattern or claim it as your own © sarah gross - crafts by sarah liz
